Detailed Description

Extend basic statistic to compute dynamic values

Such object extend the basic statistic object in order to compute the velocity of the variation of the serie of dated values.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Util::TimeStatistic::TimeStatistic (  )  [inline]

Default cstor All basic statistics are set to 0. Min is set to the maximal value of value_type and max set to the minimal value.
